Settings Reference

import { Aside, Tabs, TabItem } from “@astrojs/starlight/components”;

Overview

ltvai-kit sử dụng 2 settings files:

FilePurposeGit
settings.jsonBase settings, team-sharedCommit
settings.local.jsonPersonal overridesIgnore

File Locations

settings.json

Schema

Fields

FieldTypeDescription
modelstringClaude model identifier
permissions.allowstring[]Allowed tool patterns
permissions.denystring[]Denied tool patterns

Example

settings.local.json

Add `settings.local.json` to `.gitignore` to avoid committing personal settings.

Schema

Example

Permission Patterns

Permissions use glob-style patterns:

Syntax

ComponentDescriptionExamples
ToolTool nameBash, Read, Write, Edit
patternGlob pattern*, **/*.ts, npm:*

Pattern Examples

```json { "allow": [ "Bash(npm:*)", // All npm commands "Bash(git:status)", // Only git status "Bash(git:add *)", // git add with any args "Bash(docker:*)", // All docker commands "Bash(curl:*)" // All curl commands ], "deny": [ "Bash(rm -rf *)", // No recursive delete "Bash(sudo:*)", // No sudo "Bash(chmod:*)" // No permission changes ] } ``` ```json { "allow": [ "Read(*)", // Read any file "Read(src/**/*.ts)", // Only TypeScript in src "Read(.claude/*)" // Only .claude folder ], "deny": [ "Read(.env*)", // No env files "Read(secrets/*)" // No secrets folder ] } ``` ```json { "allow": [ "Write(src/**/*.ts)", // TypeScript in src "Write(tests/**/*)", // Test files "Write(.claude/.specs/*)" // Spec files ], "deny": [ "Write(.env*)", // No env files "Write(*.json)", // No JSON files "Write(package-lock.json)" // No lockfile ] } ``` ```json { "allow": [ "Edit(*)", // Edit any file "Edit(src/**/*)" // Only src folder ], "deny": [ "Edit(.env*)", // No env files "Edit(*.lock)" // No lock files ] } ```

Priority

  1. deny patterns take precedence over allow
  2. More specific patterns override general ones
  3. Local settings override base settings

MCP Server Configuration

.mcp.json

Server Types

TypeDescription
stdioStandard I/O based server
httpHTTP-based server

Enable/Disable in Local

Global Rules

_global.md Structure

Adding Project Rules

Create additional rule files in .claude/rules/:

Environment Variables

VariableDescription
CLAUDE_MODELOverride default model
CLAUDE_DEBUGEnable debug logging

Recommended Configurations

For Individual Developers

For Teams (Restricted)

For CI/CD

Troubleshooting

Permission denied

  1. Check deny patterns first
  2. Verify allow pattern matches
  3. Check both base và local settings

MCP server not connecting

  1. Verify command exists
  2. Check network connectivity
  3. Enable debug mode

Settings not loading

  1. Verify JSON syntax
  2. Check file location
  3. Restart Claude Code session
